categories.title: Greetings & Expressions
categories.description: Essential greetings, polite phrases, and common everyday expressions

words.exampleTranslation: Thank you very much for the help.
Excuse me, where is the metro?
Maybe I'll go to the cinema.
How's it going? Long time no see!
I'm going over there, see you in a sec!
You're welcome, it was a pleasure.
Nice to meet you, I'm Rui.

categories.title: Numbers & Time
categories.description: Counting, telling time, days of the week, and temporal expressions

words.exampleTranslation: The rent is one thousand euros.
Tomorrow I'm going to the doctor.
In the morning I have coffee.
In the afternoon I go running.
In the evening I watch television.
Meanwhile, you can set the table.
In the old days there were no mobile phones.
On Monday I'm going to the doctor.

words.example: À terça-feira tenho aula de português.
words.exampleTranslation: On Tuesday I have Portuguese class.

On Saturday I go to the beach.
On Sunday I rest at home.

words.example: O que vais fazer no fim de semana?
words.exampleTranslation: What are you going to do at the weekend?

words.exampleTranslation: You're right, it's better this way.
